CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 12, 1959, pg. A2 reads: "Summer Vacation Is Over for 370,000 Pupils - First Day - Counting parochial schools, 370,000 pupils were back in school Tuesday...lower left, Vann, Mrs. Martha Bigelow, teaching first grade reading... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Martha Bigelow, holding large picture book, seated in front of six young girls and four young boys, in classroom interior of Vann Elementary School
